price: (117) And your Lord would not have destroyed the cities unjustly while their people were reformers.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna rabbuka liyuh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā muṣ'liḥūna
